DOC.brief_summary: How PET myocardial perfusion image involve CT angiography measurement coronary flow reserve affect patient care .
DOC.brief_title: Study Value Cardiac PET Scans With Without CT Angiography and/or Measurement Coronary Flow Reserve
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research determine PET myocardial perfusion image involve CT angiography measurement coronary flow reserve affect patient care . This research also compare effectiveness scan similar test compare cost-effectiveness scan similar test time .
DOC.criteria: Patients refer Kettering Medical Center PET myocardial perfusion image without CTA and/or coronary flow reserve measurement . Patients 18 year age . Patients consent participate .
